title: The Body Swapping In SLITTERHEAD Changes The Game

description:
GameSpot's Jake Dekker and Jean-Luc Seipke got a chance to play Slitterhead - the latest project from Silent Hill creator, Keiichiro Toyama. After the Slitterhead tease, many expected a Survival Horror title, similar to Silent Hill's Resident Evil roots, but instead, Slitterhead is an action game with the twist that you can swap characters on the fly. 

As you control a ghost who possesses various people, Jake compared playing Slitterhead to the likes of Driver: San Francisco or Watch Dogs: Legion.

#gaming #slitterhead #gamespot
title: Possess EVERYONE in Slitterhead

description: Learn more about Cairn's math based movements in this developer interview with Creative Director Emeric Thoa and CEO Audrey Leprince of The Game Bakers during GameSpot Summer Live.
title: Cairn Doesn't Have Animations It has Math-Based Movements

description:
Check out a live cooperative gameplay demo of Path of Exile 2 with Trevor Gamon the Console Game Director from Grinding Gear Games and our very own Kurt Indovina. We chat through the gamepla mechanics and upcoming beta coming up later this year.

#pathofexile2 #poe2 #gaming
title: Path of Exile 2 CO-OP Gameplay Demo Live | GameSpot Summer Live 2024

description: Are you going to be picking up Path of Exile 2?
title: Path of Exile 2 at Summer Game Fest

description:
Starship Troopers: Extermination is a 16-player co-op first-person shooter set in the universe of the highly popular sci-fi franchise: Starship Troopers. Join the Deep Space Vanguard, an elite Special Forces branch of the Mobile Infantry, and report to your new commander, General Johnny Rico, voiced by Starship Troopers star Casper Van Dien! 

#starshipstroopers #gaming
title: Starship Troopers: Extermination Official Announcement Trailer

description: Lead a plucky crew against a star-consuming threat in this charming character-driven, card battling RPG. Brought to you by the creators of the award-winning Battle Chef Brigade, recruit ace pilots, upgrade their mecha Battle Suits, grow meaningful friendships and captain your personalized sci-fi saga.
title: Battle Suit Aces - Official Reveal Trailer | Future of Play 2024

description:
Explore an expansive world in this 3D Metroidvania with carefully crafted dungeons and stylish low-poly visuals, inspired by classics of the 32 and 64 bit generation.

Take control of two different characters, fated to battle each other: Codename A and Codename Z: They both have unique abilities that change how you fight and interact with the environment.
title: ABYSS X ZERO - Official Extended Gameplay Trailer | Future of Play 2024

description: Embark on an epic open-world 3D platforming collectathon adventure with Yooka and Laylee! The search for Pagies starts anew in Yooka-RepLaylee, the enhanced definitive version of the beloved indie darling with all new challenges, secrets, mechanics, and accessibility options.
title: Yooka RePLaylee - Official Announcement Trailer | Future of Play 2024

description:
You're on a path in the woods, and at the end of that path is a cabin. And in the basement of that cabin is a Princess. You're here to slay her. If you don't, it will be the end of the world. She will do everything in her power to stop you. 

 She'll charm, and she'll lie, and she'll promise you the world, and if you let her, she'll kill you a dozen times over. You can't let that happen. Don't forget, the fate of the world rests on your shoulders.
title: Slay The Princess: The Pristine Cut - Official Announcement Trailer | Future of Play 2024

description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down the guns from Perfect Dark, including the iconic Laptop Gun, the Robocop-inspired MagSec 4, and a host of alien weaponry, including the FarSight XR-20, which can see through walls.

00:00 - Opening
00:32 - Falcon 2
01:08 - Sniper Rifle
01:49 - Laptop Gun
03:27 - DY357 Magnum
04:27 - Dragon
05:59 - Super Dragon
06:37 - MagSec 4
07:21 - Cyclone
08:36 - AR34
09:50 - RC-P120
10:29 - Devastator
11:17 - Phoenix
12:04 - Callisto NTG
12:49 - FarSight XR-20
13:25 - Mauler
14:24 - Reaper

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down the guns from Perfect Dark and compares them to their real-life counterparts.

Firearms Expert Reacts playlist - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y4T78VQoWUs&list=PLpg6WLs8kxGMgYb13XjPgOKbm5O-CDq7R

If you're interested in seeing more of Jon
title: Firearms Expert Reacts to Perfect Dark’s Guns

description:
M. Bison gallops into Street Fighter 6 on June 26 with Psycho Power, knee presses, and head stomps in tow.

From riches to rags, the amnesiac dictator rides across the land on his stallion searching for an identity to make him smile.
title: Street Fighter 6 M. Bison Official Gameplay Trailer
